thread.title: Citizenship for immigrants creates stronger political integration, Stanford research shows (Stanford University)

author: wn.com
title: Citizenship for immigrants creates stronger political integration, Stanford research shows (Stanford University)
text: ( Source : Stanford University ) Stanford Report , October 22 , 2015 Stanford political scientist Jens Hainmueller found that naturalization for immigrants leads to better political participation and greater knowledge about their new country. By
